body:
Me and my pal`s were thinking about doing a survival series but in Nexus`s glitch :D
We couldn`t break blocks, but whatever.
This was the outcome of what happened and we each got our own treehouses
Me, MLGtino and zeus!
The Area:

MLGtino`s treehouse:
 

zeus`s treehouse:


Slicorn`s treehouse:
